citations.narrative:
On May 4, 2025, the Colfax Livestock Barn, a facility without a license under the Animal Welfare Act (AWA), held an
auction in which at least three animals regulated under the AWA, a female Eclectus parrot and two hedgehogs, were
advertised and sold. The animals were advertised on the facilities’ Facebook page and the owner confirmed to the
inspector in a phone call that the animals were sold at their auction on that date.
Any business, such as an operator of an auction sale, who negotiates or arranges for the purchase or sale, or transport in
commerce of an Eclectus parrot or hedgehog (or other animals covered under the Animal Welfare Act) is required to have
a valid license under the AWA. A license must be obtained prior to conducting further regulated activity.
Phone call and Exit Briefing conducted on May 6, 2025 with the facility owner.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
On May 4, 2025, the Colfax Livestock Barn, a facility without a license under the Animal Welfare Act (AWA), held an 
auction in which at least three animals regulated under the AWA, a female Eclectus parrot and two hedgehogs, were 
advertised and sold. The animals were advertised on the facilities’ Facebook page and the owner confirmed to the 
inspector in a phone call that the animals were sold at their auction on that date.  
Any business, such as an operator of an auction sale, who negotiates or arranges for the purchase or sale, or transport in 
commerce of an Eclectus parrot or hedgehog (or other animals covered under the Animal Welfare Act) is required to have 
a valid license under the AWA. A license must be obtained prior to conducting further regulated activity. 
 
Phone call and Exit Briefing conducted on May 6, 2025 with the facility owner.
